explanation: [0-0] A female character wearing a pink top and orange pants and a male character wearing black clothes are standing on a street. The male character is holding a red ax in his hand, aiming it at the back of the female character. In the background, a building with the "POLICE" sign can be seen, and there are streetlights, a bridge, and a blue sky with a few white clouds in the distance. The black text "9:01 Monday" appears at the top of the screen.

[0-2] Then the male character raises the ax as if to attack. The female character looks terrified. The female character screams and tries to block the attack with her hands. Then a dialogue box appears above the female character's head, which reads "STOP DON’T" and "MEGAN!!!".

[2-7] Then the scene switches to another angle on the street, where a long-haired female character is standing on the side of the road with her back to the camera. There is a skeleton lying on the ground in front of her. Then a dialogue box appears above the long-haired female character's head, which reads "YOU SHOULD PROBABLY RUN!". Then the scene switches back to the long shot of the street, where the long-haired female character turns her back and stands in the distance. Then the long-haired female character turns around to face the camera and starts running. Then the camera zooms in, and the long-haired female character's face turns into a horrifying skull with its mouth open in a terrifying expression.
